refnamediv.refpurpose: Get the type of the specified field in a result

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: monetdb_field_type returns the name of the specified field index.

Please note, that MonetDB supports extensible set of datatypes, meaning there is no fixed set of possible values of return parameters. However, some typical datatypes include:
chr int lng flt dbl str

example.title: monetdb_field_type example
example.programlisting:
<?php
monetdb_connect();
monetdb_query("ls;");
for($i=0;$i<monetdb_num_fields();$i++) {
	printf("field %s: name=%s type=%s\n", $i, monetdb_field_name($i), monetdb_field_type($i));
}
?>
